faqs.question: What are the MMD model fixing options?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://cdn.neoneko.xyz/catsblenderplugin/website/wiki/303688534-0d74e775-8f19-4481-8407-cd1fd098b243.png[/image]

[warning]IMPORTANT: FIX MMD MODEL SHOULD ONLY BE USED FOR NEW MMD/VRM MODELS WHICH HAVE NOT BEEN SET UP FOR UNITY, DO NOT USE THIS IF YOUR MODEL HAS ALREADY BEEN SET UP FOR UNITY (BROUGHT OF GUMROAD, BOOTH OR SOMETHING) OR IF YOU ARE CREATING YOUR OWN MODEL.[/warning]

### Features:
- Fix MMD Model:
  - Reparents bones
  - Removes unnecessary bones
  - Renames and translates objects/bones
  - Mixes weight paints
  - Rotates hips
  - Removes constraints
  - Deletes unused vertex groups
- Fixed Materials (Deprecated):
  This feature has been removed. Materials should be set up directly in Unity instead of embedding them in the FBX file. Embedded materials increase file size and memory usage in both Unity and VRChat, which is not recommended for performance optimization. The previous material fixes were specific to older VRChat requirements and are no longer necessary for current workflows.
- Combine Materials
- Remove Rigid Bodies and Joints

history.changes: Updated materials section to reflect deprecation
